frontMatter.title: Sample .md file
frontMatter.summary: Example of a markdown file with code blocks and syntax highlighting

next.title: O Canada
next.summary: The scenic lands of Canada featuring maple leaves, snow-capped mountains, turquoise lakes and Toronto. Take in the sights in this photo gallery exhibition and see how easy it is to replicate with some MDX magic and tailwind classes.
